DIA_Pablo_Q206_Cutscene_03_01: ...it wasn't even certain that he was the one stealing the goods!
DIA_Pablo_Q206_Cutscene_03_02: You could have warned me before you came up with that brilliant plan to just kill him.
DIA_Pablo_Q206_Cutscene_03_03: You guys are lucky that at least you were able to fix the other problem...
